suggested_yarn: Lion Brand Wool Ease Thick & Quick
full_text: The pattern is free to view in it’s entirety on the blog through the link here on Ravelry, which is supported by ads. There is also an ad-free, printable version available for purchase on Etsy HERE. Enjoy! This cozy fox is absolutely adorable and so easy to knit! He is perfect for beginner knitters as he is knit flat. He works up incredibly quickly, and before long, you will be addicted to making lots of cute fox friends with different sweaters. The size is lovely to make for little ones (and also for us adults who will always be kids)! Grab your super bulky yarn and have fun! Materials: Super Bulky #6 yarn in orange, cream, and mustard or chosen color for the sweater suit The pictured fox is made with Lion Brand Wool Ease Thick & Quick and the specific colors are listed in the pattern Optional small amount of worsted weight yarn for scarf US Size 10.5 (6 mm) knitting needles Black safety eyes or black yarn for eyes Charcoal or black worsted weight yarn for nose (Lion Brand Wool Ease worsted) Fiber fill for stuffing (5-10 oz) Scissors Tapestry needle to seam and weave in ends Measuring Tape Finished Size (approximate): 5” x 10” tall Gauge: Not important for this pattern Have fun!
name: Ravelry: Finnegan Easy Knit Fox pattern by Jessica Reeves Potasz
